snippet.title: Hippodrome - VC4000
snippet.description: A fun horseracing game for the Interton console. The sprite is amazing for such an old game and console. The Controls are not easy so I do trip a lot in the later part of the video. Blogpost: http://retro-spill.blogspot.com/2013/07/hippodrome-11-vc4000.html
